title: fluid.bufnmf
description: The `fluid.bufnmf` object performs Non-Negative Matrix Factorisation (NMF) to decompose the spectrum of a sound into multiple components, represented by 'bases' (spectral profiles) and 'activations' (temporal envelopes). It supports multichannel audio and allows guiding the NMF process through attributes like `basesmode` and `actmode`, enabling iterative learning and real-time sound reconstruction.
